'''Alpha v1.2.3''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released with [[Alpha server 0.2.5|server 0.2.5]] on November 24, 2010.{{cn}}

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''General'''
* Added visible hurting animations for players and mobs in multiplayer.
* Added the ability to attack [[entities]] ([[mob]]s, [[boat]]s, [[minecart]]s, and players) in multiplayer.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Oak Leaves JE3 BE4.png|32px]] [[Leaves]]'''
* No longer have darker color.
* Now decay again.

== Technical ==
=== General ===
'''[[Debug screen]]'''
* The player's current coordinates are now shown.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash related to lighting.{{cn}}
* Players in boats and minecarts now receive terrain updates.
